pullRequest.title: Set login as argument of base group members query in structure sync
pullRequest.bodyText:
replace short name of group by its login in query for sub-groups of
base group while setting members query attribute
the main identification of group is now its login, not name

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3627,14 +3627,15 @@ private void saveInformationAboutGroupStructureSynchronization(PerunSession sess
 	 *
 	 * @param sess
 	 * @param baseGroup from which are sub groups taken
-	 * @param source from which members are synchronized
+	 * @param source from which members are synchronized\

nodes.bodyText: Nit: I think you can write the message like this "...for " + group + " ...", because if you leave it like it is now, the final message will be with duplicate "group" word.

commit.message:
Set login as argument of base group members query in structure sync

 - replace short name of group by its login in query for sub-groups of
 base group while setting members query attribute
 - the main identification of group is now its login, not name
